cast.original_title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
cast.overview: Greg is coasting through senior year of high school as anonymously as possible, avoiding social interactions like the plague while secretly making spirited, bizarre films with Earl, his only friend. But both his anonymity and friendship threaten to unravel when his mother forces him to befriend a classmate with leukemia.
cast.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl

cast.original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
cast.overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
cast.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

details.biography: Chelsea Zhang is an American film and television actress and former competitive (junior) figure skater. She's a graduate of the University of Southern California, USA.
details.name: Chelsea Zhang
